channel.title: Another question
channel.description:
Ok, now listen im trying to figure out how to like add ::starter but except i want players to type it first and then they cant type it again? Understand? If you dont, dont read this.
Also, Were can i get DCLAWs ID I Cannot find on google i've searched everywhere, can someone tell me? MSN:Coder_Fatality@hotmail.com

item.title: Another question
item.dc:creator: @koopa_king koopa king
item.description:
@koopa_king wrote:

if (command.startsWith("starter")) { if (starter = 0) { addItem([Item ID], [Amount]); addItem([Item ID], [Amount]); (etc...) <- Dont add this sendMessage("You got your starter package. Woot!"); return; starter = 1; savemoreinfo(); savechar(); } else if (starter = 1) { PlayerHander.messageToAll = (playerName+ " has just tried to get another starter package! :O"); } }

That may work but I am not sure.

EDIT: Sorry I forgot some stuff…

Read full topic
